actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the limitation imposed by section 1130 of the Social Security Act upon the amount payable to States as grants for social services under the various Federal-State public assistance programs, such as day care.

summary.text: Repeals the limitations imposed by the Social Security Act upon the amount payable to States as grants for social services under specified Federal-State public assistance programs. (Repeals 42 USC 1130).

titles.title: A bill to repeal the limitation imposed by section 1130 of the Social Security Act upon the amount payable to States as grants for social services under the various Federal-State public assistance programs, such as day care.
